csp.title: CSP config generator
csp.description: Create a content security policy (CSP) configuration for your webserver to protect against cross-site scripting (XSS). Supports Apache, nginx and IIS.

uriencode.title: URI Encoder/Decoder
uriencode.description: Encode or decode query string parameters using encodeURIComponent() ensuring that all characters are encoded and decoded correctly.

minifier.title: Script Minifier
minifier.description: Minify CSS and JS scripts by rewriting the code to a more compact form. Minifying eliminates white-space and line breaks, and renames long variable names in JS.

regex.title: Regular Expression Tester
regex.description: Write and test regular expressions using the JavaScript or PHP regex engine, including a quick reference over the regular expression language.

base64.title: Base64 Encoder
base64.description: Encode your images to Base64 for inline embedding, use in style sheets, XML etc. Upload a file to convert it into its Base64-encoded string.

validator.title: HTML Batch Validator
validator.description: Batch validate multiple pages on your website from a sitemap file using the official W3C Markup Validator API. Supports HTML5, XHTML, HTML3-4 and SGML.

countdown.title: Yet Another Countdown Clock
countdown.description: Create your own Countdown Clock to any date and time and bookmark and share the link with your friends and family.

index.title: Tools
index.description: Tools for web development and optimization including common tasks as minifying, base64 encoding and HTML batch validation.
